channel.title: Version 5.12 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.12.0 (2023-05-04) Change Change In the effort to comply with WCAG standards, the implementation of the collapsible menu was changed (again). While Internet Explorer 11 has issues in displaying it, the functionality still works. New New Support for the great VSCode Front Matter CMS extension which provides on-premise CMS capabilties to Hugo.
